channel.title: Reinforcement Learning on Cylopsis
channel.description: Recent content in Reinforcement Learning on Cylopsis

item.title: T-Rex Game
item.description: This article focuses on how I used a Neural Network and concepts that I learned from Supervised Learning in a Reinforcement Learning task. The project uses a simple NN trained by using a heuristic instead of a known output since we do not know an exact expected output here. The model is based on vision and a game screenshot is the only input given to the model. The complete code for the project can be found here.
